src.sql:
declare @projectId INT = '[TknParams:projectId]'
declare @userId INT = '[TknParams:userId]'

select IIF(COUNT(ParticipantId) > 0, 1, 0) from app.ProjectParticipantParticipants PPP
inner join app.Participant P on P.Id = PPP.ParticipantId
inner join dbo.Users U on U.UserId = P.Name
inner join app.Project PR on PR.Id = PPP.ProjectId
where ProjectId = @projectId AND P.Name = @userId
